monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Buff, Shield or Heal action of an ally additionally applies one random Buff.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Breaking Spells
skills.description: Every magical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Buff Celebration
skills.description: Aura: As long as a monster in your party has 4 or more Buffs at the beginning of a turn, it gains 3 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Charged Chant
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Sorcery, Barrier or Channel (Buffs).

skills.name: Charged Healing
skills.description: This Monster's healing actions are affected by Charge stacks as if they were attacks.

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Darken
skills.description: Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a stack of Blind. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defensive Presence
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, a random Monster in the party gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Emergency Channel
skills.description: After an Action, if this Monster has less than 30% of its mana left, gain Channel (Buff).

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party deal 5% more damage.

skills.name: Exposed
skills.description: Aura: Your Monsters deal 15% more damage when attacking an enemy with Blind stacks.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Full Defense
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield, Regeneration & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (200 + 40% Magic) Applies Glory, Barrier, Channel & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Hibernate
skills.description: If this Monster spends its turn without spending Mana, it regains 25% of its Max Health and gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Holy Presence
skills.description: Aura: Every Buff, Shield or Heal action of an ally additionally applies one random Buff.

skills.name: Ice Breath
skills.description: 5 x 115% (575%) magical damage (water) Removes 2 Buffs from target - applies 2 random Buffs to itself

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Load Up
skills.description: Shield actions apply 1 Charge stack per shield. Passive shields have a 20% chance to apply 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Magic Attack
skills.description: This Monster's basic attack is replaced by Magic Attack: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage, gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Multi Barrier
skills.description: Aura: Barrier (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Affinity
skills.description: Neutral attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Polar Winds
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff) - Heal all allies for (700 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Psychokinesis
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Psychokinesis Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Psychokinesis Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sorcery & Agility (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Shadow Grasp
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Grasp Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Proc
skills.description: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Smoke Screen
skills.description: Non-damaging actions by this Monster apply a stack of Blind on two random enemies.

skills.name: Snow Veil
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Spectral Flame
skills.description: 3 x 70% (210%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 90% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 80% (320%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 105% (420%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Spectral Flame Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 105% (525%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Trickster Spirit
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Spirit Monster in the party applies a Buff or a Debuff, it is shielded by 3% of its Max Health.

skills.name: True Darkness
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party applies a Blind stack on an enemy, 30% chance to apply a random Debuff on them.

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
